member.name: IAppxEncryptedBundleWriter3.AddExternalPackageReference
member.summary: Adds a reference within the encrypted package bundle to an external app package.
member.param: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.
An that provides the contents of fileName.
A flag for whether this package is a default applicable package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptedBundleWriter3.AddPayloadPackageEncrypted
member.summary: Encrypts a new payload package to the bundle.
member.param: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.
An that provides the contents of fileName.
A flag for whether this package is a default applicable package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptedBundleWriter3
member.summary: Provides a write-only object model for encrypted bundle packages.
